, 1]	mpg	Miles/(US) gallon
[, 2]	cyl	Number of cylinders
[, 3]	disp	Displacement (cu.in.)
[, 4]	hp	Gross horsepower
[, 5]	drat	Rear axle ratio
[, 6]	wt	Weight (1000 lbs)
[, 7]	qsec	1/4 mile time
[, 8]	vs	Engine (0 = V-shaped, 1 = straight)
[, 9]	am	Transmission (0 = automatic, 1 = manual)
[,10]	gear	Number of forward gears
[,11]	carb	Number of carburetors

```{r}
#draw one sample as demo
sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 1], size=13,replace=TRUE) # 13 observation with am==1
sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 0], size=19,replace=TRUE)

mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am==0],size=19,replace=TRUE))
mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 0], size=19,replace=TRUE))
      
meanDiffs <- replicate(100,
                       mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 0], size=19,replace=TRUE)) -  
                       mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 1], size=13,replace=TRUE)))
meanDiffs
hist(meanDiffs) # histogram of mean distribution


n1 <- mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 1], size=13,replace=TRUE))
n2 <- mean(sample(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am == 0], size=19,replace=TRUE)) 
n1
n2
```
